history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01022
FULL TITLE : AN ACT DECLARING "BAYBAYIN" AS THE NATIONAL WRITING SYSTEM OF THE PHILIPPINES, PROVIDING FOR ITS PROMOTION, PROTECTION, PRESERVATION AND CONSERVATION, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
SHORT TITLE : National Writing System Act
ABSTRACT : Defines baybayin as: the ancient traditional scripts of the indigenous people.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BATAOIL, LEOPOLDO N.
DATE FILED : 2016-07-04
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Alejano (095 2017-05-29)2. Dalipe (000 2018-03-08)
3. Hofer (000 2018-08-14)4. Nieto (000 2018-10-10)
5. Tambunting (000 2018-10-17)
